JobTitle: Product Solutions Lead, Digital Rights Integrity
JobFullDesc: Digital Rights Operations is the team that is responsible for managing reports surrounding Facebook's policies and procedures, complex legal issues and the changing landscape of free speech on the Internet. We are passionate about building trust. We are constantly balancing mitigating legal risk with making the world more open and connected while scaling our operations to support Facebook's more than 3 billion users. Our Product Solutions team is responsible for building support strategies for new products or features and developing enforcement policies for bad actors to minimize legal risk on our platforms. We partner with multiple cross-functional teams including Product, Engineering, Integrity, Legal, Operations, Policy, Privacy, and Data to ensure new products successfully launch and we can effectively detect and enforce against abuse. Product Solutions helps determine data and tooling infrastructure needs to support and protect the product and its customers, as well as influences product development to support the rights holder and user. Successful candidates for this role will be incredibly passionate about minimizing abuse in products, improving experiences for rights holders and users, as well as tools that Digital Rights Operations uses to support rights holders, users, and internal stakeholders. Must have an ability to work across different time zones and capable of using analytical rigor and strong project management skills to identify and prioritize product and pain points, and the ability
